original_title: If teacher issues are not solved soon, schools would be declared Essential Service: Prez
original_body_lines: Schools would be declared an “Essential Service” if the teacher Trade Unions and officials did not sort the issues through discussions soon, the President said.
He said this while addressing a national ceremony of distribution of free textbooks and uniforms to schoolchildren held at Colombo Sanghamitta Girls’ College this morning.
While addressing the event today, he emphasized that he would not allow the schoolchildren of the country to be taken hostage by various groups. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
